item.title: Call for participation
item.description: Trust and Privacy in Networks (TRUSTNET DAY) Description of the event The second edition of TRUSTNET DAY is a 2-day workshop, whose main goal is to allow members of the research community and of the industry to exchange on matters of Trust, Security, and Privacy. Topics The first of the two workshop days will include presentations by researchers of all levels (senior, junior, Ph.D. students, etc.). The presentations and discussions will be focused on 4 topics in which the notion of trust plays a major part:
